yo what up? I'm lala, I'm 22 and I never fuccing stop daydreaming about fictional men. 
Currently a Julian fucker, so this blog will be full of The Arcana till my love boner dies down.
other fandoms/obsessions include: Rune Factory, Fire Emblem (mainly awakening tbh), Pokemon, Hamilton, Dark Souls, Mystic Messenger, + more)
you can ask me stuff, (I'm so lonely;-;)

summary: I went on a movie date, and saw Detective Pikachu, and holllllllly shit. I have so many positive emotions from it that I can't...
body:
Oh yeah

I went on a movie date, and saw Detective Pikachu, and holllllllly shit. I have so many positive emotions from it that I can’t even say in words but like alot of love was put into the CG and aaaaaaa.

but before we saw the movie.

we had to go out of town to see it cause our theater is getting renovated. so my mom and my younger sis came along (my mom drives and I wanted to bring my sister because it was her birthday a couple days ago).

but my mom had to stop at another town to get her hair colored by her good friend.

so she dropped me and my date off near the beach, because I first wanted to check out a collection store (stuff like, video games, card games, dungeons and dragons, etc)

AND LOOK AT THE GOOD SHIT I GOT

First I had mentioned rune factory, and the guy there, was like, “oh we have the strategy guide for rune factory 2” AND MY HEART AND BRAIN EXPLODED ONTO THE WALLS. I was like “I’m buying that, I must have it, I just got paid, let me buy it, where tf was this when I was looking for the god damn lover snapper or what ever snapper it was that was in the bullshit spot I eventually found.

so I did.

and just as we were about to leave.

my eyes notice something.

and I le gasped

AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAIDONTHAVEAWIIBUTMYSISTERDOESANDSODOESMYFRIEND/DATEAAAAAAAAA.

Also the guy mentioned that he just put it in the glass display that day and that it was new and AAAAAAAAAAA I ACTUALLY GOT A COPY AND IT DIDN’T COST 400 FUCCIG DOLLARS.

we then went and walked on the beach since it was low tide and it went faaar out. so we were looking for sand dollars (dead ones) and I found so many tiny ones, (I made sure they were hollow).

also this has been our second date and ajdbkdrjrbrnrjjdndnd I really do like him and aaaaaaaaaa my mom also likes him which is good.

summary: When Detective Pikachu was talking about Mewtwo and how he’s the most powerful pokemon in the world I was going to question how...
body:
When Detective Pikachu was talking about Mewtwo and how he’s the most powerful pokemon in the world I was going to question how that’s true when Dialga, Palkia and Arceus all seem to also exist.

But after thinking about it I realized I can’t question the movie for that.

I should be asking the games.

reblog.comment:

I should be asking the games.

But after thinking about it I realized I can’t question the movie for that.

I should be asking the games.

summary: So I get that Tim and his dad have been estranged for 10+ years but not once did Tim think "Hmm this Pikachu's voice sounds kind...
body: So I get that Tim and his dad have been estranged for 10+ years but not once did Tim think “Hmm this Pikachu’s voice sounds kind of familiar?” Like you really want me to believe that he wouldn’t recognize his own father’s voice? You mean to tell me in the past 10 years he didn’t call even once???

reblog.comment: So I get that Tim and his dad have been estranged for 10+ years but not once did Tim think “Hmm this Pikachu’s voice sounds kind of familiar?” Like you really want me to believe that he wouldn’t recognize his own father’s voice? You mean to tell me in the past 10 years he didn’t call even once???

trail.content_raw: So I get that Tim and his dad have been estranged for 10+ years but not once did Tim think “Hmm this Pikachu’s voice sounds kind of familiar?” Like you really want me to believe that he wouldn’t recognize his own father’s voice? You mean to tell me in the past 10 years he didn’t call even once???
trail.content: So I get that Tim and his dad have been estranged for 10+ years but not once did Tim think “Hmm this Pikachu’s voice sounds kind of familiar?” Like you really want me to believe that he wouldn’t recognize his own father’s voice? You mean to tell me in the past 10 years he didn’t call even once???

blog.name: magicallynormal
blog.title: Fanfiction and Randomness Galore!
blog.description: I'm a Asperger's girl who enjoys guy things (and a little girlie stuff on the side) I'm always coming up with Headcanons and prompts and my interests change almost daily; but if you wanna talk, I'm all ears!

body:
Detective Pikachu/Anime theory

*SPOILERS*

In the movie, it is stated that Mewtwo was not created in the Region the movie takes place in.

“Mewtwo, a Pokemon who dissapeared in the Kanto Region twenty years ago”

Now, this obviously a reference to the Pokemon Movie. But the reason this is important is that it’s implied at least once that the Anime exists within the movie.

NOT NECESSARILY THAT THEY ARE CONNECTED (despite my many posts claiming so) BUT THAT IT EXISTS AS A FORM OF MEDIA.

In the movie, a depressed Pikachu sings the theme song and my friend who I saw the movie with says he heard it during the news show.

This got my thinking; what if Ash DOES exist in the movie, but not as he does in the anime? What if the Anime was made by someone who did experience what Ash has?

What if someone who actually met Mewtwo, who rode on the back of a Lugia, who witnessed a battle between Rayquaza and Deoxys, who saw a town transported to another deminsion; what if that person made an anime based off of their own experiences?
